benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Skill Proficiency
effects: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

benefits.name: Expertise
effects: Choose one skill in which you have proficiency but lack Expertise. You gain Expertise with that skill.
